rule: Implement strong encryption mechanisms for all sensitive data at rest and in transit.
Implement robust access controls and restrict access to sensitive data to only authorized personnel.
Develop and implement a comprehensive data breach response plan to effectively identify and respond to security incidents.
Implement robust logging and monitoring systems to track and detect suspicious activity.
Conduct regular security assessments and penetration testing exercises to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
Develop and implement a data retention policy that specifies how long personal data will be retained and how it will be disposed of securely.
Implement a comprehensive privacy policy that outlines the organization's data handling practices and rights of data subjects.
Ensure compliance with all applicable data protection laws and regulations in the Union and abroad.
